Prescription Drug Harm or Homicide Offense Fund.  18   (a)  There is created on the books of the Treasurer of State, the 19  Auditor of State, and the Chief Fiscal Officer of the State a miscellaneous 20  fund to be known as the “Prescription Drug Harm or Homicide Offense Fund”.  21   (b)  The fund shall consist of:  22    (1)  Federal funds received through a grant;  23    (2)  Appropriations from the General Assembly; and  24    (3)  Other revenues and funds authorized by law.  25   (c)  The Attorney General shall use the fund to provide funding and 26  support for the prosecution of the offense of prescription drug harm or 27  homicide under § 5 -63-206. 28   29   SECTION 3.
